title: What If Our Sun Disappeared? #kurzgesagt #shorts
description:
Don't worry, if the Sun disappears, nothing bad happens to us... for the first 8 minutes and 20 seconds. No promises about everything after that.

#inanutshell #kurzgesagt #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #earthshorts #astrophysics #astronerds #whatif #astronomy #astronomyshorts
